export const client = createClient(
  createConfig<ClientOptions>({
    baseURL: "http://localhost:8000",
  })

// Interceptors
client.instance.interceptors.request.use(config => {
  if (typeof window !== "undefined") {
    const token = localStorage.getItem("access_token");
    if (token) {
      config.headers.Authorization = `Bearer ${token}`;
    }
  }
  return config;
});

client.instance.interceptors.response.use(
  response => response,
  async error => {
    const originalRequest = error.config;
    if (error.response?.status === 401 && !originalRequest._retry) {
      originalRequest._retry = true;
      try {
        const refreshToken = localStorage.getItem("refresh_token");
        if (!refreshToken) {
          throw new Error("No refresh token");
        }

        // Use fetch to avoid interceptor loop
        const baseURL = client.getConfig().baseURL || "http://localhost:8000";
        const response = await fetch(`${baseURL}/api/auth/refresh`, {
          method: "POST",
          headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" },
          body: JSON.stringify({ refresh_token: refreshToken }),
        });

        const data = await response.json();

        if (response.ok && data.success) {
          const { access_token, refresh_token: newRefreshToken } = data.data;
          localStorage.setItem("access_token", access_token);
          if (newRefreshToken)
            localStorage.setItem("refresh_token", newRefreshToken);

          client.instance.defaults.headers.common["Authorization"] =
            `Bearer ${access_token}`;
          originalRequest.headers["Authorization"] = `Bearer ${access_token}`;

          return client.instance(originalRequest);
        } else {
          throw new Error("Refresh failed");
        }
      } catch (err) {
        if (typeof window !== "undefined") {
          localStorage.removeItem("access_token");
          localStorage.removeItem("refresh_token");
          // Optional: Redirect to login
          // window.location.href = "/login";
        }
        return Promise.reject(err);
      }
    }
    return Promise.reject(error);
  }
);
